PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
namespace
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIHeading

This class represents a heading widget.

Information
Extends

PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIWidget

Options

This widget accepts the following options:

heading

The string heading.

size

The optional integer denoting the heading size (default is 1, the largest)

id

The optional id attribute.

class

An optional class attribute.

style

The optional style attribute.

other

An optional attribute to add verbatium
